Posts.Content: We are in the same boat, and our surgery is the 1st also, I wish we didn't have to wait. We are an 8 with all 12 cores positive. Also 10/12 cores had PNI's so it sounds like our journey may be similar to yours
Posts.Title: Had our first MD Anderson visit and surgery scheduled for April 1st

Posts.Content: Going back to Dr.'s office next week to get tube out and hear report following surgery with de Vinci. What information specifically should I be focused on to understand if I'm in the clear or additional treatment will be needed? I get confused with terms like" it's within the margins" does that mean it has spread but just close by? Or what does that exactly mean
Posts.Title: After surgery,now what

Posts.Content: Thank you for answering, now I know what to ask and I will post those answers after next Thursday. I do know I'm a Gleason 8 as of now. Had 12/12 cores test positive on biopsy and 10/12 cores had PNI's and bi lateral
Posts.Title: After surgery,now what

Posts.Content: PSA was only 4.5 , all 12 cores positive, did have scan,negative, going to have ultrasound this Friday

Posts.Content: I have Gleason score of 8, with 10/12 samples showing PNI's , surgery is scheduled for April 1st. Feeling a little nervous about outcome.
